remarks.format: ## Remarks The purpose of <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader> is to load the XAML and invoke an object factory metaphor, a `Save` path is not part of its intended design. The <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory> passed as a service for <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Load%2A> provides support for all further operations involving XAML and the template.
